<style id='block-visibility-screen-size-styles-inline-css'>
/* Large screens (desktops, 782px and up) */
@media ( min-width: 782px ) {
	.block-visibility-hide-large-screen {
		display: none !important;
	}
}

/* Medium screens (tablets, between 600px and 782px) */
@media ( min-width: 600px ) and ( max-width: 781.98px ) {
	.block-visibility-hide-medium-screen {
		display: none !important;
	}
}

/* Small screens (mobile devices, less than 600px) */
@media ( max-width: 599.98px ) {
	.block-visibility-hide-small-screen {
		display: none !important;
	}
}
</style>

.wp-block-megamenu-item {
  position: static;
}
.wp-block-megamenu-item__drawer {
  padding: 17px 0 21px;
  list-style: none !important;
  width: 100%;
  z-index: 100;
  overflow: hidden;
  transition: opacity 0.2s, visibility 0.2s;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: flex-end;
  background-color: rgba(240, 237, 227, 0.41);
  margin: 18px 0;
  display: none;
  gap: 16px;
  position: relative;
}
.wp-block-megamenu-item__drawer.is-visible {
  display: flex;
  max-height: 100vh;
  overflow: visible;
}
.wp-block-megamenu-item__drawer:after {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  width: 200vw;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  z-index: -1;
  background: rgba(240, 237, 227, 0.41);
}
@media (min-width: 1024px) {
  .wp-block-megamenu-item.device-visibility-mobile {
    display: none;
  }
}
@media (max-width: 1023px) {
  .wp-block-megamenu-item.device-visibility-desktop {
    display: none;
  }
}

<style id='cloudcatch-megamenu-style-inline-css'>
/*!************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************!*\
  !*** css ./node_modules/css-loader/dist/cjs.js??ruleSet[1].rules[4].use[1]!./node_modules/postcss-loader/dist/cjs.js??ruleSet[1].rules[4].use[2]!./node_modules/sass-loader/dist/cjs.js??ruleSet[1].rules[4].use[3]!./src/megamenu/style.scss ***!
  \************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************/
.wp-block-megamenu__items {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  list-style: none;
  margin: 0;
  padding-left: 0;
  gap: 5px;
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  align-items: flex-end;
  padding-top: 88px;
  background: var(--wp--preset--color--background);
  min-height: 100vh;
  z-index: 50;
  opacity: 0;
  visibility: hidden;
  min-width: 100vw;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
}
@media (min-width: 782px) {
  .wp-block-megamenu__items {
    padding-top: 164px;
    min-width: 500px;
    left: auto;
    transform: translateX(calc(-100% + 39px));
    right: auto;
  }
}
@media (max-width: 781px) {
  .wp-block-megamenu__items > [class*=wp-block]:not(.wp-block-megamenu-item) {
    padding-right: var(--wp--style--root--padding-right);
    padding-left: var(--wp--style--root--padding-left);
  }
}
.wp-block-megamenu__items .wp-block-search {
  width: 100%;
  margin: 0 0 var(--wp--preset--spacing--40);
}
.wp-block-megamenu__items.is-visible {
  opacity: 1;
  visibility: visible;
}
.wp-block-megamenu__items a {
  text-decoration: none;
}
@media (max-width: 781px) {
  .wp-block-megamenu__items a {
    padding-right: var(--wp--style--root--padding-right);
    padding-left: var(--wp--style--root--padding-left);
  }
}
.wp-block-megamenu__items:after {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  width: 200vw;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  z-index: -1;
  background: var(--wp--preset--color--background);
}
.wp-block-megamenu__items:before {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  width: 100vw;
  bottom: 0;
  right: 100%;
  z-index: -1;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.13);
  pointer-events: none;
}
.wp-block-megamenu-item {
  line-height: 1.25;
  width: 100%;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: flex-end;
}
.wp-block-megamenu > button {
  -webkit-appearance: none;
     -moz-appearance: none;
          appearance: none;
  outline: none;
  box-shadow: none;
  border: 0;
  display: block;
  padding: 0;
  cursor: pointer;
  background: none;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 60;
}

.hamburger {
  width: 39px;
  height: 30px;
  position: relative;
  transform: rotate(0deg);
  transition: 0.5s ease-in-out;
}
.hamburger span {
  display: block;
  position: absolute;
  height: 6px;
  width: 100%;
  background: var(--wp--preset--color--dark-gray);
  border-radius: 6px;
  opacity: 1;
  left: 0;
  transform: rotate(0deg);
  transition: 0.15s ease-in-out;
}
.hamburger span:nth-child(1) {
  top: 0px;
}
.hamburger span:nth-child(2), .hamburger span:nth-child(3) {
  top: 12px;
}
.hamburger span:nth-child(4) {
  top: 24px;
}
[aria-expanded=true] .hamburger span:nth-child(2) {
  transform: rotate(45deg);
}
[aria-expanded=true] .hamburger span:nth-child(3) {
  transform: rotate(-45deg);
}
[aria-expanded=true] .hamburger span:nth-child(1), [aria-expanded=true] .hamburger span:nth-child(4) {
  top: 15px;
  width: 0%;
  left: 50%;
  opacity: 0;
}
.hamburger > button {
  display: inline-flex;
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  margin-right: -10px;
  border: none;
  background: transparent;
  box-shadow: none;
  -webkit-appearance: none;
     -moz-appearance: none;
          appearance: none;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
}

/*# sourceMappingURL=style-index.css.map*/
</style>
<style id='wp-block-group-inline-css'>
.wp-block-group{box-sizing:border-box}
</style>
<style id='wp-block-heading-inline-css'>
h1.has-background,h2.has-background,h3.has-background,h4.has-background,h5.has-background,h6.has-background{padding:1.25em 2.375em}
.wp-block-heading a:where(:not(.wp-element-button)){text-decoration: none;}
</style>
<style id='wp-block-paragraph-inline-css'>
.is-small-text{font-size:.875em}.is-regular-text{font-size:1em}.is-large-text{font-size:2.25em}.is-larger-text{font-size:3em}.has-drop-cap:not(:focus):first-letter{float:left;font-size:8.4em;font-style:normal;font-weight:100;line-height:.68;margin:.05em .1em 0 0;text-transform:uppercase}body.rtl .has-drop-cap:not(:focus):first-letter{float:none;margin-left:.1em}p.has-drop-cap.has-background{overflow:hidden}p.has-background{padding:1.25em 2.375em}:where(p.has-text-color:not(.has-link-color)) a{color:inherit}
p{line-height: var(--wp--custom--typography--line-height--body);}
p a:where(:not(.wp-element-button)){color: var(--wp--preset--color--red);}
</style>
<style id='wp-block-pullquote-inline-css'>
.wp-block-pullquote{box-sizing:border-box;overflow-wrap:break-word;padding:3em 0;text-align:center}.wp-block-pullquote blockquote,.wp-block-pullquote cite,.wp-block-pullquote p{color:inherit}.wp-block-pullquote.alignleft,.wp-block-pullquote.alignright{max-width:420px}.wp-block-pullquote cite,.wp-block-pullquote footer{position:relative}.wp-block-pullquote .has-text-color a{color:inherit}:where(.wp-block-pullquote){margin:0 0 1em}.wp-block-pullquote.has-text-align-left blockquote{text-align:left}.wp-block-pullquote.has-text-align-right blockquote{text-align:right}.wp-block-pullquote.is-style-solid-color{border:none}.wp-block-pullquote.is-style-solid-color blockquote{margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;max-width:60%}.wp-block-pullquote.is-style-solid-color blockquote p{font-size:2em;margin-bottom:0;margin-top:0}.wp-block-pullquote.is-style-solid-color blockquote cite{font-style:normal;text-transform:none}.wp-block-pullquote cite{color:inherit}
.wp-block-pullquote{color: var(--wp--preset--color--red);font-size: clamp(1.6875rem, -2.0418rem + 9.9448vw, 2.8125rem);font-style: italic;line-height: 1.22;margin-right: 0;margin-left: 0;padding-top: 0;padding-bottom: 0;}
.wp-block-pullquote cite{color: var(--wp--preset--color--dark-gray);}
</style>

<style id='global-styles-inline-css'>
body{--wp--preset--color--black: #000000;--wp--preset--color--cyan-bluish-gray: #abb8c3;--wp--preset--color--white: #ffffff;--wp--preset--color--pale-pink: #f78da7;--wp--preset--color--vivid-red: }body { --wp--style--block-gap: 20px; }:where(body .is-layout-flow)  > :first-child:first-child{margin-block-start: 0;}:where(body .is-layout-flow)  > :last-child:last-child{margin-block-end: var(--wp--preset--font-family--notoserif);font-size: var(--wp--preset--font-size--heading-6);font-weight: 100;line-height: 1.555;}.wp-element-button, .wp-block-button__link{background-color: var(--wp--preset--color--dark-gray);border-color: transparent;border-width: 1px;border-style: solid;color: var(--wp--preset--color--white);font-family: var(--wp--preset--font-family--apercupro);font-size: 15px;font-weight: 500;line-height: 1.33;padding-top: 12px;padding-right: 24px;padding-bottom: 11px;padding-left: 24px;text-decoration: none;}.wp-element-button:hover, .wp-block-button__link:hover{background-color: transparent;border-color: currentColor;border-width: 1px;border-style: solid;color: var(--wp--preset--color--dark-gray);}.wp-element-caption, .wp-block-audio figcaption, .wp-block-embed figcaption, .wp-block-gallery figcaption, .wp-block-image figcaption, .wp-block-table figcaption, .wp-block-jetpack-related-posts ul[class$="__post"] {
	display: flex;
  flex-direction: column-reverse;
  
}
.wp-block-jetpack-related-posts ul[class$="__post"]:not(:last-child) {
	margin: 0 0 var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);
}
.wp-block-jetpack-related-posts [class$="__post-link"] {
  font-size: var(--wp--preset--font-size--heading-4);
	font-weight: 700;
}
.wp-block-jetpack-related-posts [class$="__post-link"] a {
	text-decoration: none;
}
.wp-block-jetpack-related-posts [class$="__post-link"] a:hover {
	color: var(--wp--preset--color--red);
}

	-webkit-appearance: auto;
    -moz-appearance: auto;
    appearance: auto;
    display: initial;
}

	vertical-align: text-top;
	font-size: 8px !important;
}

	color: var(--wp--preset--color--red);
}

    row-gap: 12px;
}

	white-space: nowrap;
	overflow: hidden;
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
}

	white-space: nowrap !important;
}

		<style>img#wpstats{display:none}</style>
		<link rel="icon" href="https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/favicon.png?w=32" sizes="32x32" />
<link rel="icon" href="https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/favicon.png?w=180" sizes="192x192" />
<link rel="apple-touch-icon" href="https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/favicon.png?w=180" />
<meta name="msapplication-TileImage" content="https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/favicon.png?w=180" />
</head>

<body class="page-template-default page page-id-7132 page-child parent-pageid-7014 wp-custom-logo wp-embed-responsive">

<div class="wp-site-blocks"><header class="alignfull site-header wp-block-template-part">
<div class="wp-block-group has-text-color has-background has-warm-white-background-color has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained">
<div class="wp-block-group is-content-justification-space-between is-nowrap is-layout-flex wp-container-5 wp-block-group-is-layout-flex"><div class="wp-block-site-logo"><a href="https://www.jesusfilm.org/" class="custom-logo-link" rel="home"><img loading="lazy" width="186" height="47" src="https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/JFP-RED.svg" class="custom-logo" alt="Jesus Film Project" decoding="async" /></a></div>


<div class="wp-block-group site-header__actions is-nowrap is-layout-flex wp-container-4 wp-block-group-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-buttons is-layout-flex wp-block-buttons-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-button is-style-small"><a class="wp-block-button__link has-red-background-color has-background wp-element-button" href="https://www.jesusfilm.org/how-to-help/ways-to-donate/give-now-2/?amount=&amp;frequency=single&amp;campaign-code=NXWJPO&amp;designation-number=2592320&amp;thankYouRedirect=https://www.jesusfilm.org/dev/special/thank-you-refer/social-share/">Give Now</a></div>
</div>


<form role="search" method="get" action="https://www.jesusfilm.org/" class="block-visibility-hide-medium-screen block-visibility-hide-small-screen wp-block-search__button-outside wp-block-search__text-button wp-block-search"><label class="wp-block-search__label" for="wp-block-search__input-2" >Search</label><div class="wp-block-search__inside-wrapper " ><input class="wp-block-search__input" id="wp-block-search__input-2" placeholder="" value="" type="search" name="s" required /><button aria-label="Search" class="wp-block-search__button wp-element-button" type="submit" >Search</button></div></form>


<nav class="wp-block-cloudcatch-megamenu wp-block-megamenu open-click static has-apercupro-font-family has-heading-1-font-size" role="navigation"><button aria-label="Toggle menu"><div class="hamburger"><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span></div></button><ul class="wp-block-megamenu__items"><form role="search" method="get" action="https://www.jesusfilm.org/" class="block-visibility-hide-large-screen wp-block-search__button-outside wp-block-search__text-button wp-block-search"><label class="wp-block-search__label" for="wp-block-search__input-3" >Search</label><div class="wp-block-search__inside-wrapper " ><input class="wp-block-search__input" id="wp-block-search__input-3" placeholder="" value="" type="search" name="s" required /><button aria-label="Search" class="wp-block-search__button wp-element-button" type="submit" >Search</button></div></form>

</div>
</div>
</div>
</header>


<div class="wp-block-group site-content is-layout-flow wp-block-group-is-layout-flow"><div class="entry-content wp-block-post-content has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-block-post-content-is-layout-constrained">
<div class="wp-block-group hero-section has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained" style="padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32)">
<div class="wp-block-columns is-style-separator is-layout-flex wp-container-9 wp-block-columns-is-layout-flex" style="border-bottom-color:var(--wp--preset--color--light-soft-gray);border-bottom-style:solid;border-bottom-width:1px;padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40)">
<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<div class="wp-block-jf-breadcrumbs">
	<nav aria-label="breadcrumbs" class="rank-math-breadcrumb"><p><a href="https://www.jesusfilm.org">Home</a><span class="separator"> / </span><a href="https://www.jesusfilm.org/about/">About</a><span class="separator"> / </span><span class="last">Statement of Faith</span></p></nav></div>



<h1 class="wp-block-heading">Our Statement of Faith</h1>



<p class="has-medium-font-size">The core of what we believe as a ministry is found in the Holy Bible. Fully inspired by the Holy Spirit, we believe the Bible reigns supreme. It is the perfect word of God, written free of errors, and it has the final say in all matters it discusses.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow" style="padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40)">
<p>In Matthew 28:19, the Bible commands us:</p>



<figure class="wp-block-pullquote"><blockquote><p>“Go therefore and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit”</p></blockquote></figure>



<p class="has-medium-font-size">Christians recognize this commandment as the <em>Great Commission</em>. As obedient Christ-followers, our greatest worldly commitments are to share the promise of Jesus with men of every nation. The teachings from the Bible help us achieve that.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-container-11 wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained">
<p class="has-text-align-center has-apercupro-font-family" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:500">Our Statement of Faith</p>



<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-center has-heading-1-font-size">Using the Bible, We Accept These Statements as Truth:</h2>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group statement-of-faith__grid has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-container-29 wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained" style="margin-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40);margin-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40)">
<div class="wp-block-group has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained" style="border-radius:8px;border-top-color:#D4D2C9;border-top-style:solid;border-top-width:1px;border-right-color:#D4D2C9;border-right-style:solid;border-right-width:1px;border-bottom-color:#D4D2C9;border-bottom-style:solid;border-bottom-width:1px;border-left-color:#D4D2C9;border-left-style:solid;border-left-width:1px;padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--48);padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32)">
<p>There is one true God, eternally existing in three persons—Father, Son, and Holy Spirit—each of whom possesses equally all the attributes of Deity and the characteristics of personality.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained" style="border-radius:8px;border-top-color:#D4D2C9;border-top-style:solid;border-top-width:1px;border-right-color:#D4D2C9;border-right-style:solid;border-right-width:1px;border-bottom-color:#D4D2C9;border-bottom-style:solid;border-bottom-width:1px;border-left-color:#D4D2C9;border-left-style:solid;border-left-width:1px;padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--48);padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32)">
<p>Jesus Christ is God, the living Word, who became flesh through miraculous conception by the Holy Spirit, and virgin birth. Hence, He is perfect Deity and true humanity united in one person forever.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained" style="border-radius:8px;border-top-color:#D4D2C9;border-top-style:solid;border-top-width:1px;border-right-color:#D4D2C9;border-right-style:solid;border-right-width:1px;border-bottom-color:#D4D2C9;border-bottom-style:solid;border-bottom-width:1px;border-left-color:#D4D2C9;border-left-style:solid;border-left-width:1px;padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--48);padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32)">
<p>He lived a sinless life and voluntarily atoned for the sins of men by dying on the cross as their substitute, thus satisfying divine justice and accomplishing salvation for all who trust in Him alone.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained" style="border-radius:8px;border-top-color:#D4D2C9;border-top-style:solid;border-top-width:1px;border-right-color:#D4D2C9;border-right-style:solid;border-right-width:1px;border-bottom-color:#D4D2C9;border-bottom-style:solid;border-bottom-width:1px;border-left-color:#D4D2C9;border-left-style:solid;border-left-width:1px;padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--48);padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32)">
<p><br>He rose from the dead in the same body, though glorified, in which He lived and died.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained" style="border-radius:8px;border-top-color:#D4D2C9;border-top-style:solid;border-top-width:1px;border-right-color:#D4D2C9;border-right-style:solid;border-right-width:1px;border-bottom-color:#D4D2C9;border-bottom-style:solid;border-bottom-width:1px;border-left-color:#D4D2C9;border-left-style:solid;border-left-width:1px;padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--48);padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32)">
<p>He ascended bodily into heaven and sat down at the right hand of God the Father, where He, the only mediator between God and man, continually makes intercession for His own.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained" style="border-radius:8px;border-top-color:#D4D2C9;border-top-style:solid;border-top-width:1px;border-right-color:#D4D2C9;border-right-style:solid;border-right-width:1px;border-bottom-color:#D4D2C9;border-bottom-style:solid;border-bottom-width:1px;border-left-color:#D4D2C9;border-left-style:solid;border-left-width:1px;padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--48);padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32)">
<p>Man, originally created in the image of God, sinned by disobeying God, alienating him from his Creator. That historic fall brought all mankind under divine condemnation.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained" style="border-radius:8px;border-top-color:#D4D2C9;border-top-style:solid;border-top-width:1px;border-right-color:#D4D2C9;border-right-style:solid;border-right-width:1px;border-bottom-color:#D4D2C9;border-bottom-style:solid;border-bottom-width:1px;border-left-color:#D4D2C9;border-left-style:solid;border-left-width:1px;padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--48);padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32)">
<p>Man’s nature is corrupt making him entirely unable to please God. Every man is in need of regeneration and renewal by the Holy Spirit.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained" style="border-radius:8px;border-top-color:#D4D2C9;border-top-style:solid;border-top-width:1px;border-right-color:#D4D2C9;border-right-style:solid;border-right-width:1px;border-bottom-color:#D4D2C9;border-bottom-style:solid;border-bottom-width:1px;border-left-color:#D4D2C9;border-left-style:solid;border-left-width:1px;padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--48);padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32)">
<p>The salvation of man is wholly a work of God’s free grace and is not the work, in whole or in part, of human works, goodness, or religious ceremony. God imputes His righteousness to those who put their faith in Christ alone for their salvation, and thereby justified them in His sight.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained" style="border-radius:8px;border-top-color:#D4D2C9;border-top-style:solid;border-top-width:1px;border-right-color:#D4D2C9;border-right-style:solid;border-right-width:1px;border-bottom-color:#D4D2C9;border-bottom-style:solid;border-bottom-width:1px;border-left-color:#D4D2C9;border-left-style:solid;border-left-width:1px;padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--48);padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32)">
<p>It is the privilege of all who are born again of the Spirit to be assured of their salvation from the very moment in which they trust Christ as their Savior. This assurance is not based on human merit, but is produced by the witness of the Holy Spirit, who confirms in the believer the testimony of God in His written word.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained" style="border-radius:8px;border-top-color:#D4D2C9;border-top-style:solid;border-top-width:1px;border-right-color:#D4D2C9;border-right-style:solid;border-right-width:1px;border-bottom-color:#D4D2C9;border-bottom-style:solid;border-bottom-width:1px;border-left-color:#D4D2C9;border-left-style:solid;border-left-width:1px;padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--48);padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32)">
<p>The Holy Spirit has come into the world to reveal and glorify Christ and to apply the saving work of Christ to men. He convicts and draws sinners to Christ, imparts new life to them, continually indwells them from the moment of spiritual birth, and seals them until the day of redemption. His fullness, power, and control are appropriated in the believer’s life by faith.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained" style="border-radius:8px;border-top-color:#D4D2C9;border-top-style:solid;border-top-width:1px;border-right-color:#D4D2C9;border-right-style:solid;border-right-width:1px;border-bottom-color:#D4D2C9;border-bottom-style:solid;border-bottom-width:1px;border-left-color:#D4D2C9;border-left-style:solid;border-left-width:1px;padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--48);padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32)">
<p>Every believer is called to live in the power of the indwelling Spirit and to not fulfill the lust of the flesh, bearing fruit to the glory of God.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained" style="border-radius:8px;border-top-color:#D4D2C9;border-top-style:solid;border-top-width:1px;border-right-color:#D4D2C9;border-right-style:solid;border-right-width:1px;border-bottom-color:#D4D2C9;border-bottom-style:solid;border-bottom-width:1px;border-left-color:#D4D2C9;border-left-style:solid;border-left-width:1px;padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--48);padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32)">
<p>Jesus Christ is the Head of the Church, His Body, which is composed of all men, living and dead, who have been joined to Him through saving faith.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained" style="border-radius:8px;border-top-color:#D4D2C9;border-top-style:solid;border-top-width:1px;border-right-color:#D4D2C9;border-right-style:solid;border-right-width:1px;border-bottom-color:#D4D2C9;border-bottom-style:solid;border-bottom-width:1px;border-left-color:#D4D2C9;border-left-style:solid;border-left-width:1px;padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--48);padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32)">
<p>God admonishes His people to assemble together regularly for worship, for participation in ordinances, for edification through the Scriptures and for mutual encouragement.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained" style="border-radius:8px;border-top-color:#D4D2C9;border-top-style:solid;border-top-width:1px;border-right-color:#D4D2C9;border-right-style:solid;border-right-width:1px;border-bottom-color:#D4D2C9;border-bottom-style:solid;border-bottom-width:1px;border-left-color:#D4D2C9;border-left-style:solid;border-left-width:1px;padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--48);padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32)">
<p>At physical death the believer enters immediately into eternal, conscious fellowship with the Lord and awaits the resurrection of his body to everlasting glory and blessing.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained" style="border-radius:8px;border-top-color:#D4D2C9;border-top-style:solid;border-top-width:1px;border-right-color:#D4D2C9;border-right-style:solid;border-right-width:1px;border-bottom-color:#D4D2C9;border-bottom-style:solid;border-bottom-width:1px;border-left-color:#D4D2C9;border-left-style:solid;border-left-width:1px;padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--48);padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32)">
<p>At physical death the unbeliever enters immediately into eternal, conscious separation from the Lord and awaits the resurrection of his body to everlasting judgment and condemnation.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained" style="border-radius:8px;border-top-color:#D4D2C9;border-top-style:solid;border-top-width:1px;border-right-color:#D4D2C9;border-right-style:solid;border-right-width:1px;border-bottom-color:#D4D2C9;border-bottom-style:solid;border-bottom-width:1px;border-left-color:#D4D2C9;border-left-style:solid;border-left-width:1px;padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--48);padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32)">
<p>Jesus Christ will come again to the earth—personally, visibly, and bodily—to consummate history and the eternal plan of God.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained" style="border-radius:8px;border-top-color:#D4D2C9;border-top-style:solid;border-top-width:1px;border-right-color:#D4D2C9;border-right-style:solid;border-right-width:1px;border-bottom-color:#D4D2C9;border-bottom-style:solid;border-bottom-width:1px;border-left-color:#D4D2C9;border-left-style:solid;border-left-width:1px;padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--48);padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32);padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--32)">
<p>The Lord Jesus Christ commanded all believers to proclaim the Gospel throughout the world and to disciple men of every nation. The fulfillment of that Great Commission requires that all worldly and personal ambitions be subordinated to a total commitment to “Him who loved us and gave Himself for us.”</p>
</div>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-cover alignfull" style="padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--100);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--100)"><span aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-cover__background has-background-dim"></span><img decoding="async" fetchpriority="high" width="1440" height="585" class="wp-block-cover__image-background wp-image-12396" alt="" src="https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/jf-sof-cover.jpg" data-object-fit="cover" srcset="https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/jf-sof-cover.jpg 1440w, https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/jf-sof-cover.jpg?resize=300,122 300w, https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/jf-sof-cover.jpg?resize=768,312 768w, https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/jf-sof-cover.jpg?resize=1024,416 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1440px) 100vw, 1440px" /><div class="wp-block-cover__inner-container has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-container-31 wp-block-cover-is-layout-constrained">
<figure class="wp-block-pullquote is-style-brand-logo has-background-color has-text-color"><blockquote><p>If your mission aligns with the Great Commission, let’s walk alongside each other. Learn what it means to become a ministry partner and how it can benefit your community and unreached communities across the globe.</p></blockquote></figure>



<div class="wp-block-buttons is-layout-flex wp-block-buttons-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-button"><a class="wp-block-button__link has-warm-white-background-color has-background wp-element-button" href="https://www.jesusfilm.org/partners/">Become a Ministry Partner</a></div>
</div>
</div></div>
</div></div>


<footer class="alignfull site-footer wp-block-template-part">
<div class="wp-block-group has-text-color has-background has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained" style="padding-top:92px">
<div class="wp-block-group site-footer__grid is-layout-flow wp-container-46 wp-block-group-is-layout-flow">
<div class="wp-block-group site-footer__grid-col-1 is-layout-flex wp-block-group-is-layout-flex"><div class="wp-block-site-logo"><a href="https://www.jesusfilm.org/" class="custom-logo-link" rel="home"><img loading="lazy" width="157" height="39" src="https://www.jesusfilm.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/JFP-RED.svg" class="custom-logo" alt="Jesus Film Project" decoding="async" /></a></div>

<p style="line-height:1.2">100 Lake Hart Drive<br>Orlando, FL, 32832</p>
</div>

		<style id="skip-link-styles">
		.skip-link.screen-reader-text {
			border: 0;
			clip: rect(1px,1px,1px,1px);
			clip-path: inset(50%);
			height: 1px;
			margin: -1px;
			overflow: hidden;
			padding: 0;
			position: absolute !important;
			width: 1px;
			word-wrap: normal !important;
		}

		.skip-link.screen-reader-text:focus {
			background-color: #eee;
			clip: auto !important;
			clip-path: none;
			color: #444;
			display: block;
			font-size: 1em;
			height: auto;
			left: 5px;
			line-height: normal;
			padding: 15px 23px 14px;
			text-decoration: none;
			top: 5px;
			width: auto;
			z-index: 100000;
		}
	</style>
		<script>
	( function() {
		var skipLinkTarget = document.querySelector( 'main' ),
			sibling,
			skipLinkTargetID,
			skipLink;

		// Early exit if a skip-link target can't be located.
		if ( ! skipLinkTarget ) {
			return;
		}

		/*
		 * Get the site wrapper.
		 * The skip-link will be injected in the beginning of it.
		 */
		sibling = document.querySelector( '.wp-site-blocks' );

		// Early exit if the root element was not found.
		if ( ! sibling ) {
			return;
		}

		// Get the skip-link target's ID, and generate one if it doesn't exist.
		skipLinkTargetID = skipLinkTarget.id;
		if ( ! skipLinkTargetID ) {
			skipLinkTargetID = 'wp--skip-link--target';
			skipLinkTarget.id = skipLinkTargetID;
		}

		// Create the skip link.
		skipLink = document.createElement( 'a' );
		skipLink.classList.add( 'skip-link', 'screen-reader-text' );
		skipLink.href = '#' + skipLinkTargetID;
		skipLink.innerHTML = 'Skip to content';

		// Inject the skip link.
		sibling.parentElement.insertBefore( skipLink, sibling );
	}() );
	</script>
		<script type="text/javascript">
		function genesisBlocksShare( url, title, w, h ){
			var left = ( window.innerWidth / 2 )-( w / 2 );
			var top  = ( window.innerHeight / 2 )-( h / 2 );
			return window.open(url, title, 'toolbar=no, location=no, directories=no, status=no, menubar=no, scrollbars=no, resizable=no, copyhistory=no, width=600, height=600, top='+top+', left='+left);
		}
	</script>
	
	<svg class="clip-path">
		<clipPath id="clip-path-1" clipPathUnits="objectBoundingBox"><path d="M0.049,0 C0.022,0,0,0.03,0,0.066 v0.508 c0,0.03,0.015,0.056,0.035,0.064 l0.941,0.361 c0.012,0.004,0.023,-0.008,0.023,-0.024 V0.066 C1,0.03,0.978,0,0.951,0 H0.049"></path></clipPath>
	</svg>

	<script>
		document.addEventListener( 'splideReady', function( e ) {
			e.detail.defaults = {
				arrowPath: 'M33.7,12.7c5.4,3.4,5.4,11.2,0,14.6L15.5,38.7c-5.7,3.6-13.2-0.5-13.2-7.3V8.6c0-6.8,7.4-10.9,13.2-7.3L33.7,12.7z'
			};
		} );
	</script>

	
	<script>
		function brandedCheckoutRedirect() {
			const queryString = window.location.search;
			const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(queryString);
			const maybeRedirect = urlParams.get('thankYouRedirect');
			if (maybeRedirect && maybeRedirect.length > 0) {
				window.location = maybeRedirect;
			}
		}
		window.onOrderCompleted = function () { brandedCheckoutRedirect(); };
	</script>

	<script type="text/javascript" src="https://www.jesusfilm.org/_static/??/wp-content/plugins/genesis-blocks/dist/assets/js/dismiss.js,/wp-content/themes/jesusfilm-2023/assets/js/main.js?m=1682107841j" ></script><script defer src='https://stats.wp.com/e-202349.js' id='jetpack-stats-js'></script>
<script id="jetpack-stats-js-after">

</script>

</html>
